content:
AssetDeliveryPolicyType AssetDeliveryPolicyType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Policy type for dynamic encryption of assets.

Edit

In this Article

public enum AssetDeliveryPolicyTypePublic Enum AssetDeliveryPolicyType

Fields

Blocked Blocked

The Asset should not be delivered via this AssetDeliveryProtocol.

DynamicCommonEncryption DynamicCommonEncryption

Apply Dynamic Common encryption.
DynamicCommonEncryptionCbcs DynamicCommonEncryptionCbcs

Apply Dynamic Common encryption with cbcs.
DynamicEnvelopeEncryption DynamicEnvelopeEncryption

Apply Dynamic Envelope encryption.
NoDynamicEncryption NoDynamicEncryption

Do not apply dynamic encryption to the asset.
None None

Delivery Policy Type not set. An invalid value.
